text: Tamagra olivi masavenuti eri maseve huta nefreta, mnanentake paurana rama'a tamavufgarera rutritri huteta vuta, Moleki havi anumzantera monora ome hunentaze. Ana nehuta mono'ma huntesnaza havi anumzankura vahe huzmantazage'za afete moparega nevu'za, fri vahe matipinena ana havi anumzankura ome nehakaze.
